title: 605. Joe Montana on Preparation, Poise & Keys to Success for a QB
itunes:title: 605. Joe Montana on Preparation, Poise & Keys to Success for a QB
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. To start off, the guys break down the height of the Patriots' offensive line and have a further discussion on undersized offensive linemen (2:09). Then, Hall of Fame QB Joe Montana joins as he discusses his experiences as a player with the 49ers and Chiefs, the winning culture in San Francisco and level of perfection his former coach Bill Walsh strived for, gives his definition of poise and much more (7:39). To wrap up the show, DJ and Bucky revisit a piece of a past interview with Los Angeles Dodgers manager Dave Roberts, which was on the importance of managing relationships with players (38:42).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
